name: Clarissa Mendiola
bio: Clarissa Mendiola has Chamoru roots and was raised in California. She earned a BA from the University of San Francisco and an MFA from the California College of the Arts. In her writing, she examines cultural identity, specifically by considering her multicultural background. She has published poetry in As/Us Journal, Platte Valley Review, and elsewhere. Mendiola lives in San Francisco.
